email.subject: Backup Servers
email.body:
Excellent #PLAYERNAME#!
Then let's get you setup with something crucial for the competition.
You need yourself a BACKUP server. Somewhere you can securely store important files!
Your EXEs and X-Server.sys could be tampered with or deleted so it's best to have a spare ready for you.
I've already set a server up, and linked the IP below. Login and upload your important files!
Let me know when you're ready to proceed.
> NOTE: This mission is skippable, simply reply "done" to advance. WARNING: if you do NOT backup your files, you risk getting stuck later in the game.
